description: Describes the given dataset. For more information on datasets, see CreateDataset.

parameters.name: datasetArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the dataset to describe.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the dataset.

nested_items.name: datasetArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the dataset that you want metadata for.

nested_items.name: datasetGroupArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the dataset group.

nested_items.name: datasetType
nested_items.description: One of the following values:
Interactions.
Items.
Users.
Actions.
Action_Interactions.

nested_items.name: schemaArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the associated schema.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of the dataset.
CREATE PENDING > CREATE IN_PROGRESS > ACTIVE -or- CREATE FAILED.
DELETE PENDING > DELETE IN_PROGRESS.

nested_items.name: creationDateTime
nested_items.description: The creation date and time (in Unix time) of the dataset.

nested_items.name: lastUpdatedDateTime
nested_items.description: A time stamp that shows when the dataset was updated.

nested_items.name: latestDatasetUpdate
nested_items.description: Describes the latest update to the dataset.

nested_items.name: schemaArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the schema that replaced the previous schema of the dataset.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of the dataset update.

nested_items.name: failureReason
nested_items.description: If updating a dataset fails, provides the reason why.

nested_items.name: creationDateTime
nested_items.description: The creation date and time (in Unix time) of the dataset update.

nested_items.name: lastUpdatedDateTime
nested_items.description: The last update date and time (in Unix time) of the dataset.

nested_items.name: trackingId
nested_items.description: The ID of the event tracker for an Action interactions dataset. You specify the tracker's ID in the PutActionInteractions API operation. Amazon Personalize uses it to direct new data to the Action interactions dataset in your dataset group.
